text: madeenaavaalon aur usake aasapaas ke baddoohon ko aisa nahin chaahie tha ki allaah ke rasool ko chhodakar peechhe rah jaen aur na yah ki usakee jaan ke muqaabale mein unhen apanee jaan adhik priy ho, kyonki vah allaah ke maarg mein pyaas ya thakaan ya bhookh kee koee bhee takaleef uthaen ya kisee aisee jagah qadam rakhen, jisase kaafiron ka krodh bhadake ya jo charaka bhee ve shatru ko lagaen, usapar unake hak mein anivaaryatah ek sukarm likh liya jaata hai. nissandeh allaah uttamakaar ka karmaphal akaarath nahin jaane deta
